description: Devold® Breeze are soft and lightweight wool garments especially developed for days when in need of ultra-lightweight clothing that is breathable and adjusts the body temperature. Made of 100% Merino wool of our finest quality, these products are guaranteed to be itch-free against the skin. Merino wool has a cooling effect when it is hot and feels warm against the skin when the temperature drops. Wool is naturally breathable, regulates body temperature according to activity and is also soft and flexible – which is a must for physical activity. In addition, wool is naturally resistant to odours, which makes it a favourite among those on the go. These are garments you can use several times without necessarily needing to wash them – just dry and air out, before they are ready for using again. You save both time and the environment by avoiding unnecessary washing, which makes these garments perfect for longer trips.
name: Breeze Merino 150 LS Shirt - Womens
